variables.name: argument_stress
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, did you have an argument or disagreement with someone?
If yes, how stressul was this experience?

1 = not endorsed
2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

variables.name: let_pass_stress
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, did anything else happen that you could have argued or disagreed about, but you let it pass?
If yes, how stressul was this experience?

1 = not endorsed
2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

variables.name: friend_relative_stress
variables.description: Stressfulness of something happening to a friend/relative
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, did anything happen to a close friend or relative that turned out to be stressful for you?
If yes, how stressul was this experience?

1 = not endorsed
2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

variables.name: health_stress
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, did anything stressful happen regarding your personal health?
If yes, how stressul was this experience?

1 = not endorsed
2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

variables.name: other_stress
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, did anything else happen that most people would consider stressful?
If yes, how stressul was this experience?

1 = not endorsed
2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

variables.name: covid_stress
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, how much time did you spend thinking about coronavirus/COVID-19?
If yes, how stressul was this experience?

1 = not endorsed
2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

variables.name: socialfunc_interactions
variables.coding:
Since the last survey, about how many times did you talk or communicate with someone
else?

1 = 0 interactions
2 = 1 interaction
3 = 2 or 3 interactions
4 = 4 or more interactions

variables.name: alert_sleepiness
variables.coding:
Please indicate your
sleepiness during the 5
minutes before this
survey by choosing the
appropriate description.

1 = extemely alert
9 = very sleepy, great effort to keep awake, fighting sleep

4 = very true

variables.name: finish
variables.coding:
To what extent are you currently having difficulty with following through on instructions and failing to finish things?

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

variables.name: organization
variables.coding:
To what extent are you currently having difficulty with organization?

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

variables.name: mentaleffort
variables.description: Avoiding, disliking, reluctantly doing things that require a lot of mental effort
variables.coding:
To what extent are you currently having difficulty with avoiding, disliking, or reluctantly doing things that require a lot of mental effort?

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

variables.name: forgetful
variables.coding:
To what extent are you currently having difficulty with being forgetful?

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

variables.name: fidgeting
variables.coding:
To what extent are you currently having difficulty fidgeting with your hands or feet or squirming in seat?

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

variables.name: motor
variables.description: Acting as if driven by a motor
variables.coding:
To what extent are you currently having difficulty with feeling “on the go” or acting as if you are “driven by a motor”?

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

variables.name: study_time
variables.coding: 24 hour clock in local time zone

variables.name: sleep_dur
variables.coding: Time between typical bed and wake up time

variables.name: socialfunc_comp
variables.coding: Mean of three social functioning items on a 0-7 scale

variables.name: ds_median_r_tc
variables.coding: Median reaction time on correct responses

variables.name: crt_median_r_tc
variables.coding: Median reaction time on correct responses

variables.name: gcpt_dprime
variables.coding: Accuracy computed as d-prime

variables.name: mot_percent_correct
variables.coding: Proportion of correct targets
